response.overview: “The Garageland Chronicles” is a feature-length film anthology of 12 interconnected stories exploring situations, relationships, and perspectives centered around workers and customers of a small town record store. The film was created using a mix of film professionals, students, and amateurs. Each story used a different combination of writers, director of photography and creatives behind the scenes. The film is directed by Shaun Springer. Through this collaboration, we explore avenues of narrative through drama, comedy, fantasy, music videos, and much more.
response.tagline: What is a story? How is it told?
response.title: The Garageland Chronicles

results.name: The Garageland Chronicles - Kickstarter Exclusive Trailer
